name: Build Your Own E Juice
description:
At Mt Baker Vapor we know everyone has their own personal tastes! We make e juice to order and the way juice is mixed allows us to give our customers the best options around! 
Introducing build your own E Juice! 
When building your own E Juice you are purchasing a 15/30/50ml bottle of Juice. You are able to combine up to 6 flavors together. We allow "6 parts for 15ml bottles" and "12 parts for 30ml bottles" and "20 parts for 50ml bottles" to be mixed together. A part is the proportion of the flavor. All orders must add up to 12 parts exactly otherwise you will delay shipping while we get ahold of you to correct your custom blend. 
"6 PARTS" 15ml bottle
"12 PARTS" 30ml bottle
"20 PARTS" 50ml bottle
"96 PARTS" 236ml bottle
If there is an error we will try to make the flavor the way you intended as to not delay shipping.
